category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_user_panel_content_display
preference.preference_description: Controls the display of users and groupmember lists in Active Workspace user selection panels. Valid values are: * 0 - Users without checkbox: Display users and hide the checkbox that allows switching to users with group/role. * 1 - Users with checkbox: Display users and show the checkbox that allows switching to users with group/role. * 2 - Group members without checkbox: Display users with group/role and hide the checkbox that allows switching to users. * 3 - Group members with checkbox: Display users with group/role and show the checkbox that allows switching to users.
